text:
is this in any way helped by the new workflow resolver?

what did you mean by this, anyway?
creator: gregor@apache.org

text:
The original idea was to have a set of workflow interfaces and a basic default
implementation. But then the WorkflowFactory utility class with static methods
was introduced, which avoided the dynamic selection of the workflow implementation.

The workflow resolver is meant to replace the WorkflowFactory. Because it is an
Avalon service, the WorkflowResolver implementation can be configured (not yet
per publication, but that can be added later on if desired).
creator: andreas@apache.org
